<MethodEndpoint

Update a webhook's details such as its URL or event type.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"API-SECRET","in":"header","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"The secret API key for authentication."},{"name":"apiKey","in":"query","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"The public API key for authentication."}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"webhookId":{"type":"string"},"webhookUrl":{"type":"string"},"eventType":{"type":"string"}},"title":"WebhookUpdateRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
